params.name: t
params.description: Number of travelers

params.name: hr
params.description: Number of rooms

params.name: hd1
params.description: Check-in date

params.name: hd2
params.description: Check-out date

params.name: hc1
params.description: City

params.name: hs1
params.description: State (two-letter postal code)

params.name: hn1
params.description: Country (two-letter code)

params.name: ha1
params.description: Nearest airport IATA 3 letter code to the search location

params.name: hz1
params.description: 5-digit postal code of the hotel

params.name: hp
params.description: Purchase price, with cents dropped, and no '$'. For example, pass $455.79 as 455

params.name: g
params.description: Customer's gender - 0 for male, 1 for female.

params.name: n
params.description: Customer's first name

params.name: hl
params.description: Hash of customer loyalty program number

params.name: hc
params.description: Room type

params.name: ra1
params.description: The nearest airport IATA 3 letter code to the pick-up location

params.name: rc1
params.description: The city of the pick-up location

params.name: rd1
params.description: The date the traveler wants to pick up the car

params.name: ra2
params.description: The nearest airport IATA 3 letter code to the drop-off location

params.name: rc2
params.description: The city of the drop-off location

params.name: rd2
params.description: The date the traveler wants to drop off the car

params.name: rc
params.description: Class of car, i.e. subcompact = 1, compact = 2, etc.

params.name: rl
params.description: Hash of customer loyalty program

params.name: rp
params.description: Purchase price, with cents dropped, and no '$'. For example, pass $455.79 as 455
